item.title:
RT by @WeWantPlates: See this? See what's missing..?
Shame I didn't bring my fucking oven gloves with me.
And if they bring my overpriced cake out on a sodding roof tile...I'll lose it. #ForkHandles
item.dc:creator: @The_Mighty_S
item.description:
See this? See what's missing..?

Shame I didn't bring my fucking oven gloves with me.

item.title:

item.title:
RT by @WeWantPlates: "Here's your pork, sir." "Where?" "In the trough." "What?" "The trough." "Eh?" "On the chute." "Eh?" "In the grass."
(Pic: @UKChris1982)
item.dc:creator: @WeWantPlates
item.description:
"Here's your pork, sir."
"Where?"
"In the trough."
"What?"
"The trough."
"Eh?"
"On the chute."
"Eh?"
"In the grass."

(Pic: @UKChris1982)

item.title:
RT by @WeWantPlates: I thought this was a joke, but it's real.
"The first course was the most controversial of the meal and not because of the spoonable duck brain served in a duck bill."
The restaurant Noma in Copenhagen has a seasonal menu that will put you off eating for the next decade.
item.dc:creator: @Mackenzie_Noake
item.description:
I thought this was a joke, but it's real.

"The first course was the most controversial of the meal and not because of the spoonable duck brain served in a duck bill."

The restaurant Noma in Copenhagen has a seasonal menu that will put you off eating for the next decade.

item.title: RT by @WeWantPlates: There are only 6,000 plates left in the wild after hipsters introduced slates to these shores in 2014. In 2022 we need your support more than ever. #HappyNewYear
item.dc:creator: @WeWantPlates
item.description: There are only 6,000 plates left in the wild after hipsters introduced slates to these shores in 2014. In 2022 we need your support more than ever. #HappyNewYear
